title: Magazine cover font indentification help
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kim-kardashian-cosmopolitan-magazine-cover-south-africa-1-492x669_4044.jpg)
  
Appologies for the image size. I am aware of the titles font, help is needed for rest of the font used on cover. Any help appreciated

Solved By: 

 [hasnain125](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625/http:/typophile.com/user/213115 "View user profile.")
author: speedninja

comments.content:
Hello,

Four Different Type of Font Faces,

[Nimbus Sans no5 TCYMEd (Regular)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=NimbusSanNo5TCYMed%20-%20Regular&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=1e161eda4e36c72cd78713e1813fab36&wrap=2&text=SUMMER)

[Tom Becker (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=TomBecker%20-%20Bold&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=03d5a2b2443d3bcecd4b3c5f33b55f74&wrap=2&text=BEACH-F)

[Frederic (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Frederic%20-%20Bold&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=0f58c1b1c86c72891177efc2af21d083&wrap=2&text=THING)

[Doris PP (bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Doris%20PP%20-%20bold&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=97a5bbf1b00e737c87b3ea4716844c70&wrap=2&text=MOVIE)

Hope This Helps.

Though I see [Neue Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/) and [Avenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826010625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir/) on the image.
